scroll - Variable in class client.view.MainMenu
A JScrollPane object which allows the user to scroll through the data being displayed.

searchBar - Variable in class client.view.MainMenu
A SearchBar object which the user can enter item info into and receive search results which are displayed to the JFrame.
SearchBar - Class in client.view
This class sets the size and appearance of a search bar.
SearchBar() - Constructor for class client.view.SearchBar
Constructs a SearchBar object with the set size and appearance.
SearchBarListener - Class in client.controller
This class contains the necessary methods to allow a user to search for any item in the inventory by the item's ID or name by entering it into a text field.
SearchBarListener(MainMenu, Client) - Constructor for class client.controller.SearchBarListener
Constructs a new object of type SearchBarListener
searchLabel - Variable in class client.view.MainMenu
Two JLabel objects which display the title of the frame to the user.

socket - Variable in class client.controller.Client
The Socket object which is the endpoint for the communication with the server.
socketIn - Variable in class client.controller.Client
The BufferedReader object which reads the socket input stream to receive data from the server.
socketOut - Variable in class client.controller.Client
The PrintWriter object which writes to the socket output stream to communicate with the server.
south - Variable in class client.view.MainMenu
Multiple JPanel objects which act as container for different displays to the user.
stdIn - Variable in class client.controller.Client
The BufferedReader object which reads user input.
